attributes.action: reject out of hand the prospect of any compensation being paid to any perpetrators of violent or murderous acts anywhere in the UK, especially those commited during the troubles in northern ireland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would be a total travesty & an unforgivable insult to all who suffered if any compensation is paid to those who died or were injured committing these heinous acts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
